cards.name: Mount Chromaziel
cards.originalText:
{T}, Reveal a land card from your hand: Add to your mana pool one mana of any type that the revealed card could produce.
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}, {T}: Search your library for a multicolored card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: The types of mana are {W}, {U}, {B}, {R}, {G}, and {C}.

To determine what types of mana the revealed card could produce, look at all activated and triggered abilities of that card, including non-mana abilities, and determine which types of mana they could produce if they were to resolve right now, taking into account any replacement effects, but ignoring the abilities' costs.
If the revealed card couldn't produce mana, Mount Chromaziel does not produce any mana. It won't produce colorless mana instead.
If you reveal another Mount Chromaziel, no mana is produced. Your hand is a hidden zone, even if some or all cards in it happen to be revealed.
If you reveal Crumbling Vestige, Mount Chromaziel can produce any type of mana. The mana that could be produced doesn't have to come from a mana ability.
If you reveal Desert Temple or Dream Frontier, Mount Chromaziel can produce any type of mana, regardless of whether you control any creatures.
If you reveal Dreamborn Paradise, no mana is produced. No color has been chosen.
If you reveal Frontier Outpost, Moxenite Mine, Unknown Shores, or Valley of Pyramids, Mount Chromaziel can produce any type of mana.
If you reveal Madame Tawney's Saloon, Mount Chromaziel can produce colored mana only if you control a nonland permanent. It can always produce {C}.
If you reveal Mana Confluence, Mount Chromaziel can produce any color of mana, but not {C}.
If you reveal Memory Lane, Mount Chromaziel produces {C}. The Memory Lane in your hand doesn't have a voyage counter on it.
